Posts.Content: May 11, 2011 11:22PM hnl90 wrote: I've been told that my future is every 6 months it will be MRI, then Mammogram, then MRI, then Mammogram, and so on and so on. Amazing how one Doctor will swear by one method and another not.  Just how do we then make any decisions for ourselves?
